parameter.name: ShoppingContext-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: ShoppingContext 應用程式在 web.config 中用來存取資料庫的連接字串。
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=(localdb)\MSSQLLocalDB; Initial Catalog=ShoppingDBClone.ShoppingDB-20190510170325; Integrated Security=True; MultipleActiveResultSets=True; AttachDbFilename=|DataDirectory|ShoppingDbfile.mdf
